DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with D9421-C for 8 weeks in Japanese patients with mild to moderate active Crohn's disease will improve their symptoms of Crohn's disease and quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of D9421-C 9 mg and 15 mg Versus Placebo in Japanese Patients With Active Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Female or male aged ≥ 18 and ≤ 65 years Diagnosis of Crohn's Disease Having ileostomy or pouch and/or colostomy Having previous gastric surgery Having a known or suspected systemic infection
